SEARCH
Package Game.Mission

Class Map<T>

java.lang.Object
Game.Mission.Graph<T>
Game.Mission.Map<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The generic type representing the elements in the graph.
All Implemented Interfaces:
GraphADT<T>
public class Map<T> extends Graph<T>
The Map class represents the game's map, implemented as a graph.
Author:
Tânia Morais, Tomás Neto

      public Target getTarget()
      Retrieves the target associated with the map.
      Returns:
      The target currently set in the map.

    • setTarget

      Sets the target for the map.
      Parameters:
      target - The target to be set on the map.

    • getAdjacentDivisions

      public ArrayUnorderedList<Division> getAdjacentDivisions(Division division)
      Returns the divisions adjacent to a specified division.
      Parameters:
      division - The division for which you want to find adjacent divisions.
      Returns:
      A list of adjacent divisions to the specified division.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - If the division is not found in the graph.

    • getDivisionInaRange

      public ArrayUnorderedList<Division> getDivisionInaRange(Division start, int maxRange) throws EmptyCollectionException
      Finds all divisions within a specified range of a given division, limited by `maxRange`.
      Parameters:
      start - The starting division for the search.
      maxRange - The maximum distance to search for divisions.
      Returns:
      A list of divisions within the specified range of the starting division.
      Throws:
      EmptyCollectionException - If the search encounters an empty collection.

    • findShortestPath

      public ArrayUnorderedList<Division> findShortestPath(Division start, Division target)
      Finds the shortest path from a starting division to a target division.
      Parameters:
      start - The starting division.
      target - The target division to reach.
      Returns:
      A list representing the shortest path from start to target.

      Returns:
